title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Comments on Post Office Horizon Compensation Scheme
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 22 March 2022.
content:
The Horizon IT dispute has had a devastating impact on postmasters and their families, with many losing their livelihoods or being wrongly convicted for crimes they didn’t commit.
